Adventure Guildsman:
Buff for Pet and Servitor automatically disappears when the summoning is canceled. Read the contents of each Buff Set carefuly!
The following pet or servitor exclusive buffs that you can receive as as follows.
For the warrior buff set, it is Berserker Spirit, Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Bless Shield, Bless the Body, Haste, Agility, and Vampiric Rage.
For the wizard buff set, it is Berserker Spirit Magic Barrier, Shield, Wind Walk, Bless the Soul Empower, and Acumen.
Warrior buff set - 4,000 points
Wizard buff set - 2,100 points
Select individual buffs to receive
